name: PETSCII Lemmings for Commodore PET
description:
A Lemmings-like game done in PETSCII graphics for the Commodore PET computer. Coded for TOJam game jam weekend in May 2021.

Play it on a real Commodore PET (woohoo!), on the VICE emulator or drag the file into an online PET emulator. Tested on PET/CBM 3032 and 4032. 

Notes: (1) 32K required, (2) Only first 6 levels currently working.

Who says you need colour graphics, 3D, multichannel sound and any more than 8-bits to have fun?
